player.name: Abraham
player.physicalDescription: Elderly man with long white beard and deeply weathered face showing both wisdom and kindness, strong build despite his age
player.clothing: Simple shepherd's robes in earth tones, wooden staff, sandals
player.attributeDescription: father of nations through unwavering faith

figure.name: Sarah
figure.physicalDescription: Beautiful elderly woman with kind eyes and silver-white hair, weathered face showing both joy and hardship, dignified bearing of a matriarch
figure.clothing: Fine linen robes in cream and soft blue, modest head covering, simple gold jewelry
figure.attributeDescription: mother of nations through faithful endurance

connection.narrative: Together they left everything familiar, waited decades for a child, and became the father and mother of nations. Their partnership shows that even when God's promises seem impossible, faithful waiting bears fruit.
connection.relationship: husband and wife, partners in faith

side-by-side.playerAction: standing with arm around Sarah, looking toward the horizon with hope
side-by-side.figureAction: leaning into Abraham, one hand on her heart, sharing his vision

blessing.playerAction: hands raised in blessing over Sarah
blessing.figureAction: head bowed receiving the blessing, hands clasped

promise.playerAction: pointing up at the stars, explaining God's promise
promise.figureAction: looking up in wonder, hand over her mouth in amazement
